title: Great Turtle Graphics Program
comment: Easy to use, after a short tutorial, and can make great images. Just remember, this is a programming language, not a game.

title: Awesome LOGO implementation
comment: This app does everything right: the program editor is easy to use, the animated turtle (um, robot) gives instant feedback what programs do, and the language is nicely powerful so that you can write sophisticated programs, too. Thank you very much for the great app!
Could not see any instructions for how does it work, may take much time to even understand the basic working of the app

title: Good app with room for improvement
comment: Two shortcomings I'd like to see remedied. Most critical, reordering commands appears to be almost completely broken. Although you can reorder commands -- very simply and intuitively, I might add -- those changes do not stick. That makes developing complex drawings very frustrating. Second, it would be great if the animation speed were variable.   Overall it's a good app with promise. I hope the developer sticks with it.

Thanks for pointing out that issue!  I will put it on the todo list and hopefully fix that shortly.

Edit:  The command reordering feature should now be fixed.  An update has just been pushed out.  We are sorry for the inconvenience!

title: Fun time waster
comment: I've already wasted half my morning with this! It's a ton of fun to think of and create new shapes once you get the hang of it.  The tutorials are a great start, and there is plenty to explore!

title: Fantastic
comment: LOGO was my introduction to programming, courtesy of Mr. Wizard.  This is an excellent implementation of LOGO with a very well thought out visual interface.

Hello,

We are sorry for the inconvenience, but we have added many instructions since the beta version of our app.
We have also added many examples on our website.

title: Pretty nifty!
comment: Spending waaay too much time at work with this. Fun and intelligent drawing app.
